resources.string:
Generally, lisps are caused by incorrect 
 tongue placement for the type of sound
 that you are trying to make. This can be
 either learned or the result of a tongue-tie
 or tongue-thrust.
Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsumLorem ipsumLorem ipsumLorem ipsumLorem ipsumLorem ipsum Lorem ipsumLorem ipsum
Try tapping your arm and move your hand \n down to your palm while you say it, like a \n snake sliding. Keep practicing!!
Remember to lightly touch your \n tongue behind your front teeth.
Take your time and say the \'s\' \nsound slowly and clearly.
Let the air flow smoothly like a soft breeze
